detail.detailText: BPCOR-6135: A fault was not handled in the process scope; Fault Name is {http://docs.oasis-open.org/wsbpel/2.0/process/executable}invalidVariables; Fault Data is <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><jbi:message xmlns:sxeh="http://www.sun.com/wsbpel/2.0/process/executable/SUNExtension/ErrorHandling" type="sxeh:faultMessage" version="1.0" xmlns:jbi="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/jbi/wsdl-11-wrapper"><jbi:part>BPCOR-6175: Invalid document &lt;?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?&gt;&lt;jbi:message xmlns:msgns="http://infosys.tuwien.ac.at/aic10/ass1/dto/shipping" type="msgns:ship_items" version="1.0" xmlns:jbi="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/jbi/wsdl-11-wrapper"&gt;&lt;jbi:part&gt;&lt;item&gt;&lt;product id="1"/&gt;&lt;/item&gt;&lt;/jbi:part&gt;&lt;jbi:part xmlns:msgns="http://infosys.tuwien.ac.at/aic10/ass1/dto/customer" xmlns:ns0="http://infosys.tuwien.ac.at/aic10/ass1/dto/shipping" xmlns:ns1="http://infosys.tuwien.ac.at/aic10/ass1/dto/customer" xmlns:ns2="http://infosys.tuwien.ac.at/aic10/ass1/dto/customer" id="1"&gt;&lt;street&gt;Googlegasse&lt;/street&gt;&lt;city&gt;Vienna1&lt;/city&gt;&lt;house&gt;8&lt;/house&gt;&lt;door&gt;20&lt;/door&gt;&lt;zipCode&gt;1234&lt;/zipCode&gt;&lt;shipping&gt;true&lt;/shipping&gt;&lt;billing&gt;true&lt;/billing&gt;&lt;other&gt;false&lt;/other&gt;&lt;/jbi:part&gt;&lt;/jbi:message&gt; is assigned to Ship_itemsIn in BP instance (192.168.2.6:19bc513d:12d7fe559d4:-7f0e) at line 307 BP {http://enterprise.netbeans.org/bpel/lab2_25_nemesis/lab2_25_nemesis}OrderProcess</jbi:part></jbi:message>. Sending errors for the pending requests in the process scope before terminating the process instance Caused by: BPCOR-6175: Invalid document <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="no"?><jbi:message xmlns:msgns="http://infosys.tuwien.ac.at/aic10/ass1/dto/shipping" type="msgns:ship_items" version="1.0" xmlns:jbi="http://java.sun.com/xml/ns/jbi/wsdl-11-wrapper"><jbi:part><item><product id="1"/></item></jbi:part><jbi:part xmlns:msgns="http://infosys.tuwien.ac.at/aic10/ass1/dto/customer" xmlns:ns0="http://infosys.tuwien.ac.at/aic10/ass1/dto/shipping" xmlns:ns1="http://infosys.tuwien.ac.at/aic10/ass1/dto/customer" xmlns:ns2="http://infosys.tuwien.ac.at/aic10/ass1/dto/customer" id="1"><street>Googlegasse</street><city>Vienna1</city><house>8</house><door>20</door><zipCode>1234</zipCode><shipping>true</shipping><billing>true</billing><other>false</other></jbi:part></jbi:message> is assigned to Ship_itemsIn in BP instance (192.168.2.6:19bc513d:12d7fe559d4:-7f0e) at line 307 BP {http://enterprise.netbeans.org/bpel/lab2_25_nemesis/lab2_25_nemesis}OrderProcess BPCOR-6129: Line Number is 307 BPCOR-6130: Activity Name is AssignShipment Caused by: Too many elements: {null}quantity
